text: Graphic arts is a term that was used for the art of printmaking and drawing. Today it means the skills of a graphic designer or print technician. Graphic arts as a trade can be traced back to the first instances of the stamped image or word. ==Traditional meaning== Graphic art is an artistic process of creating a design where one uses a medium (like rubber or plexiglas) and transfers the image to a material (like paper). ==Related pages== *Graphic design ==References== ==Other websites== * American Institute of Graphic Artists * Online Design Degrees Category:Graphics
title: Graphic arts
